pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Environment variables:
BAZEL_LOCAL_RAM_RESOURCES -- Limit the amount of RAM in MiB for Bazel. FORCE_LLVM_SLOT -- Force to build with a particular llvm slot.
Examples:
BAZEL_LOCAL_RAM_RESOURCES=2048 BAZEL_LOCAL_RAM_RESOURCES=4096 FORCE_LLVM_SLOT=11

use.flag: Use of Clang + LLD to build the package
If disabled, it will disable SSP, FORTIFY_SOURCE, Full RELRO.
XLA (Accelerated Linear Algebra) Optimizing Compiler for TensorFlow
